author: chfast
content: The "non-legacy" forks are fully covered already. I mean e.g. SSTORE test case 0 → X → 0.

author: chfast
content: I mostly would need to enable some existing tests for some legacy forks like Frontier.

author: dimitry8570
content:
It can be generated if you make expect section for those forks in new tests. Then you can PR a new test file in legacy tests. 

The format might changed a little.
